name: Saviors Of The World
description:
Saviors of the Word is a strategic game where you lead a Super Heroes Team to protect the city against the invaders !

Coordinate your different type of heroes so as to block enemies, fight them and rescue the civilians that have been kidnapped. 

And when there is too much enemies or you're in lack of time to planify your moves... use you're special ability to slow down time speed and reorganise your team !

This game was made by Mathieu Charpentier and Roman Grzegorzewski.
